name: node-localstorage
description: A drop-in substitute for the browser native localStorage API that runs on node.js.

scripts.test: npm run build && coffeetape test/*.coffee | tap-spec
scripts.coverage: npm run build && nyc --reporter=lcov coffeetape test/*.coffee | tap-nyc
scripts.publish:patch: npm run test && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run test && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm run test && npm version major && npm publish
